channel.title: Synchronisation on Office 365 blog
channel.description: Recent content in Synchronisation on Office 365 blog

item.title: How to use a non-routable on-premises UPN with Office 365 and Azure AD
item.description: I’ve recently noticed that many organisations moving to Office 365 are struggling with their current on-premises non-routable UPNs. In this blog, I’ll show how to use Office 365 without altering on-premises UPNs.
